alert.note: Alert for Cody Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 2:17PM MST until February 21 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Periods of snow, mainly light. Up to an additional inch of snow is possible. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph will cause blowing snow in areas that received over an inch of snow overnight. * WHERE...Cody Foothills. * WHEN...Now until 5 PM today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
